title: Zombie Outbreak Motel Adventure #57
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Motel Room 7
rooms.description: A dingy motel room with peeling wallpaper and a musty smell. The window is boarded up with wooden planks, and scratching sounds come from outside. A flickering TV shows an emergency broadcast. Blood stains mark the carpet near the door. The room contains a bed, nightstand, and a small bathroom. Groaning echoes from the hallway.

items.name: wooden nightstand
items.description: A cheap nightstand with two drawers, one of which appears to be locked

items.name: motel brochure
items.description: A faded brochure advertising the motel's amenities
items.text: Welcome to Sunset Motel - Est. 1957! Manager: Frank Morrison. Office hours: 24/7. In case of emergency, contact the office or proceed to the emergency supply room. Free coffee in the lobby!

items.name: office key
items.description: A brass key with a tag reading 'OFFICE'

items.name: flickering television
items.description: An old TV showing static and emergency broadcasts
items.text: EMERGENCY BROADCAST: Outbreak confirmed. Avoid contact with infected individuals. Seek shelter immediately. Emergency supplies located in designated safe rooms. Manager Frank Morrison has activated emergency protocols.

items.name: bathroom cabinet
items.description: A small medicine cabinet above the sink

items.name: handwritten note
items.description: A crumpled note left by a previous guest
items.text: Day 3 of the outbreak. I'm trapped in Room 7. The motel manager said the emergency supply room has everything we need to survive - food, weapons, a radio. The combination to the nightstand is the year this place opened. I'm going to make a run for it. - Jake

items.name: unmade bed
items.description: A bed with rumpled sheets and a pillow

items.name: heavy flashlight
items.description: A metal flashlight that could be used as a weapon

items.name: boarded window
items.description: A window covered with wooden planks. Shadows move outside.
items.text: Through gaps in the boards, you can see the parking lot filled with abandoned cars and shambling figures. The office is across the lot.

items.name: motel room door
items.description: A sturdy door leading to the hallway. You can hear groaning and shuffling outside.

rooms.name: Motel Office
rooms.description: The motel's front office is in disarray. Papers are scattered everywhere, and a coffee pot has shattered on the floor. The front desk has a computer still running and a cash register hanging open. A bulletin board displays emergency procedures. A heavy metal door marked 'SUPPLY ROOM' stands at the back. The smell of stale coffee and fear permeates the air.

items.name: front desk
items.description: A wooden desk with a computer, phone, and several drawers

items.name: manager's log book
items.description: A daily log kept by the motel manager
items.text: Manager's Log - Frank Morrison: The outbreak started three days ago. I've secured all emergency supplies in the supply room. Only authorized personnel should access it. Security protocol requires knowledge of: my name, where supplies are kept, and the motel's founding year.

items.name: office computer
items.description: A desktop computer with several windows open
items.text: Email from Corporate: Frank, ensure all emergency supplies are moved to the designated supply room. In case of evacuation, this is the primary safe zone. Stock includes food, water, medical supplies, and communication equipment.

items.name: emergency bulletin board
items.description: A cork board with various notices and emergency procedures pinned to it
items.text: EMERGENCY PROCEDURES: In case of outbreak or disaster, proceed to emergency supply room. Manager Frank Morrison is responsible for all safety protocols. Supplies stored in supply room include: non-perishable food, water, first aid, radio equipment, and weapons.

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with employee and guest records

items.name: employee roster
items.description: A list of motel staff members
items.text: SUNSET MOTEL STAFF: Frank Morrison - Manager, Maria Garcia - Housekeeper, Tom Chen - Maintenance. Manager Morrison has been with us since the motel opened in 1957.

items.name: coffee station
items.description: A counter with a broken coffee pot and supplies

items.name: survival guide pamphlet
items.description: A government-issued survival guide for outbreak scenarios
items.text: OUTBREAK SURVIVAL GUIDE: Secure yourself in a safe location with supplies. The supply room is your best option for long-term survival. Avoid the infected at all costs. Wait for rescue teams.

items.name: open cash register
items.description: An old-fashioned cash register with the drawer hanging open

items.name: note about supply room
items.description: A sticky note attached to some cash
items.text: Reminder: Supply room has everything we need - food, water, medical supplies, weapons, and a working radio to call for help. The security system will ask verification questions. - Frank

items.name: heavy metal supply room door
items.description: A reinforced steel door with a digital security panel. Three security questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: What is the manager's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the motel brochure, manager's log, and employee roster

password_questions.question: Where are emergency supplies kept?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention where supplies are stored

password_questions.question: What year was the motel established?
password_questions.hint: The motel brochure and employee roster mention the founding year

rooms.name: Emergency Supply Room
rooms.description: You've made it to the emergency supply room! A well-stocked bunker-like space with metal shelves lined with canned food, water bottles, and medical supplies. A gun safe stands in the corner. A ham radio crackles with distant transmissions. Most importantly, a reinforced emergency exit door leads to the roof access and the fire escape - your route to safety. You're going to survive this!

items.name: supply shelves
items.description: Industrial shelving units packed with survival supplies

items.name: gun safe
items.description: A locked safe containing weapons for self-defense

items.name: ham radio
items.description: A working radio transmitter and receiver
items.text: The radio crackles: 'This is rescue team Alpha. We are evacuating survivors from rooftops. If you can reach a roof, signal us with a flashlight. We will extract you.'

items.name: medical supply kit
items.description: A comprehensive first aid kit with bandages, antibiotics, and other medical necessities

items.name: emergency exit to roof
items.description: A reinforced door with a push bar leading to roof access and the fire escape

rooms.win_message: You've reached the emergency supply room and found the way out! Grabbing supplies and the flashlight, you push through the emergency exit and climb the stairs to the roof. In the distance, you see a helicopter approaching. You signal with your flashlight, and the rescue team spots you. As the helicopter descends, you realize you've survived the zombie outbreak. You win!
